title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message:
820-2850 Battery not detected.
Turn on with charger, green light , in osx shows no battery, but if i take out  power adapter the laptop works 
fine with battery. This is know good battery, Battery indicator no light. Any help please.

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message: Same with BIL disconnected?

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message: BIL ??

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message:
J6955, BIL connector.
If still the same, post voltage and diode mode to ground at SCL/SDA lines.

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message:
Yes , same with bill disconnected.
Voltagae and   SCL= 1v,  SDA=  .5v TO 0V 
diode mode to ground at SCL=.34, SDA=.463

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message:
You have problems on I2C battery bus.
Remove D6950 and check again.

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message:
After remove  D6950
Voltage at   SCL= 1v,  SDA=  .6v to 0
diode mode to ground at SCL=.342, SDA=.461

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message:
"Voltage at   SCL= 1v,  SDA=  .6v to 0"
With charger connected???

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message: yes, it should be 3.4 V , do you know how to get idea how this charging do work?

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message:
You have big difference on SCL/SDA lines in diode mode.
Could be U7000, or SMC.
Remove first C6952/53 (if present) and check again.

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message: After removing c6952/53 got scl=.323 and sdl= .454, Changed isl625, scl=.454, sdl=.454 but  voltage at sdl =0 , scl=3.42. it could be smc??

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message:
If both lines have now the same diode mode reading, this is a progress.
Be sure R5280 is good snd check continuity to SDA line.

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message: R5280 is good  2k and continuity to sda line is ok, Pin 10 at u7000 =0 v. it could be u7000 itself faulty or smc?

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message: Check SDA level directly on the battery connector and R5280.

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message: SDA level directly on the battery connector and R5280 is ok and 0 v.

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message: Check again diode mode on SCL/SDA lines.

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message: diode mode on SCL/SDA lines.= .479 and .464

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message:
Not a good difference there.
Change U7000 again.
If issue persists, change SMC.

title: 820-2850 Battery not detected.
message: Change u7000 again no luck. dont have right donor board. so will do it latter.
